issue.title: Basket perimeter surface gets wrong by adding/removing elements
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Basket perimeter surface (area) gets wrong by adding/removing WFS per-defined perimeter elements.
* On each add the geodesic area is calculated and added to total surface
* On each removal  the geodesic area is calculated and removed from total surface

Problem is: at each operation roundings take place, and after some add/remove the surface is wrong.

I suggest to calculate the surface of all selected perimeter at each changes.

Note: this issue may be present before 4.3.x, but impact is low since there's no pricing based on order surface.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
